description: As a guest of the 10KTF shop, Creative Director Alessandro Michele gifts Wagmi-san a magical globe holding the future of 10KTF Gucci Grail. Multiplied by a factor of 5000, it becomes the 10KTF Gucci Grail Mint Pass for those who want to see their PFPs differently. With its magic, the creations that arise from the collaboration between Alessandro Michele and Wagmi-san can be redeemed.
